message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $1,500,000 to you. Considering its unique features and benefits, I would like to extend an offer to you at a special price of $1,400,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure this item at a price that is higher than what others might be willing to pay, while still allowing you to enjoy significant savings. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. Please let me know your thoughts on this offer.
